test-case.description: Should have the correct parameters in parameter set ByName
test-case.name: Set-SqlDscAgentOperator.When command has correct parameter sets.Should have the correct parameters in parameter set ByName

failure.message: Expected strings to be the same, but they were different. Expected length: 104 Actual length: 415 Strings differ at index 65. Expected: '...> -Name <string> [-EmailAddress <string>] [-WhatIf] [-Co...' But was: '...> -Name <string> [-EmailAddress <string>] [-CategoryName...' -----------------------------------------------^

test-case.description: Should have the correct parameters in parameter set ByObject
test-case.name: Set-SqlDscAgentOperator.When command has correct parameter sets.Should have the correct parameters in parameter set ByObject

failure.message: Expected strings to be the same, but they were different. Expected length: 93 Actual length: 404 Strings differ at index 54. Expected: '...bject <Operator> [-EmailAddress <string>] [-WhatIf] [-Co...' But was: '...bject <Operator> [-EmailAddress <string>] [-CategoryName...' -----------------------------------------------^
